pages.title: Metallic Transition
pages.text: Take care in this place. The $(thing)Mist$() is a great risk to one's personal health. Unfortunately the path to making it safer means risking the danger. You're going to need to harvest a material know as $(item)Niobium$(), which can be found as an ore on the cliffs around the mist.

Fortunately, the $(thing)Mist ebbs and flows with daylight$(), and is at its lowest at night, allowing careful collection of this precious ore, though that's to speak nothing of the other dangers of this realm. $(br2)Take care my child. $(br2)Note: Unlike $(item)Foggy Stone$() and most other materials here, $(item)Niobium Ore$() can be harvested with any pickaxe.
